DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether teen young woman would prefer Nuvaring oral contraceptive pill try method .
DOC.brief_title: Oral Contraceptive Pills Compared Vaginal Rings
DOC.detailed_description: Sexually active young woman ( n=130 ) , age 15-21 year , randomly assign use either vaginal ring oral contraceptive pill initial study interval three 28-day cycle , follow three cycle alternate method . Participants complete survey method use , acceptability side effect baseline , three cycle , six cycle , well follow telephone interview one month study completion .
DOC.criteria: Sexually active young woman ( n=130 ) , English Spanish speaking , age 1521 year , able willing try oral contraceptive vaginal ring 6 month Not able willing use hormonal contraceptive , move area , pregnant intend become pregnant study time frame , sexually active
